item.title: 2020.09.17 patch notes (v99.01) | K TERA
item.description: 1. New game mode (TERA BATTLE ARENA) Added new game mode TERA BATTLE ARENA (TBA) Mode can be accessed after server selection screen Game mode is a 3-Person team battleground, featuring 18 different heroes from TERA Heroes Braga Dougal Shaolung Elleon Kubel Shizune (placeholder) Theolong (placeholder) Ciebel Ryshan Astina Zolyn Erhan (placeholder) Ironfang Dixie Uwu Fraya Rohan Thor Mutarr Livia Paesyn More information about TBA is noted in GM Note 2.
